attributes.action: to make Tarceva (Erlotinib) available on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My dad was diagnosed with lung cancer in February and chemo did not work for him. He was lucky enough to get funding for Tarceva, but it should be available to any patient, unlike Mr Hill who's 6 yr old daughter had to raise the funds for him!
